item.title: Why can't I hold all these Slack emojis?
item.author: 0xdeadbeef@devilmayco.de (ɯlǝɥlᴉʍ)
item.description: Previously, last blog post I wrote covered how to make a quick escape with your precious hoard of custom Slack emojis. It was fairly well-received, but didn’t quite cover the next step in the migration process; how do you upload your millions of little images to your new Slack workspace?
